result.purpose: This folder/module is responsible for handling exchange rate data and interacting with external APIs to fetch token prices.
result.architecture: The folder follows a modular architecture pattern, separating concerns between API client implementation and data models.

internal/infras/exchangerate/client.go.purpose: This file implements a client for fetching token prices from an external exchange rate API.

internal/infras/exchangerate/models.go.purpose: Defines data structures for handling exchange rate prices.
